detail_desc: Blouse in an airy weave with a deep V-neck, decorative buttons down the front, long puff sleeves and cuffs with a covered button. Seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back, and a gently flared peplum.

Blouse in an airy weave with a deep V-neck, decorative buttons down the front, long puff sleeves and cuffs with a covered button. Seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back, and a gently flared peplum.

Blouse in an airy weave with a deep V-neck, decorative buttons down the front, long puff sleeves and cuffs with a covered button. Seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back, and a gently flared peplum.
Satin blouse with long sleeves, a V-neck with inset lace trims and wide cuffs with a covered button.
Satin blouse with long sleeves, a V-neck with inset lace trims and wide cuffs with a covered button.

Transparent blouse in textured lace with a low neckline with rounded details and an opening at the back with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Seams at the front with decorative lace trims, long sleeves, and narrow elastication with a wide flounce at the hem.
Earrings in various designs in metal and plastic. Size 0.5-2 cm.

Blouse in an airy cupro blend containing glittery threads. Round neckline with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck, pin-tucks at the front and flounces down the front and back. Long dolman sleeves with narrow elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, and a seam with a drawstring and peplum at the hem.

Blouse in an airy cupro blend containing glittery threads. Round neckline with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck, pin-tucks at the front and flounces down the front and back. Long dolman sleeves with narrow elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, and a seam with a drawstring and peplum at the hem.
Long metal earrings decorated with sparkly stones. Length 8.5 cm.

Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in soft pima cotton jersey. Fitted V-neck top with a lace trim at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Short shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and lace-trimmed hems.

Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in soft pima cotton jersey. Fitted V-neck top with a lace trim at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Short shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and lace-trimmed hems.
Jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Mesh-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and elasticated cuffs. Mesh lining.
Jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Mesh-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and elasticated cuffs. Mesh lining.
Jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Mesh-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and elasticated cuffs. Mesh lining.
Jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Mesh-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and elasticated cuffs. Mesh lining.
Jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Mesh-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and elasticated cuffs. Mesh lining.
Straight-cut top in soft viscose jersey with a round, beaded neckline and an opening with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck. Gently dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Straight-cut top in soft viscose jersey with a round, beaded neckline and an opening with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck. Gently dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Derby shoes in imitation leather with lacing at the front, a welt seam around the soles and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and TPR (thermoplastic rubber) soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
V-neck top in satin with lace trims, a sewn-in wrapover at the front and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist and a gentle flare to the hem.
V-neck top in satin with lace trims, a sewn-in wrapover at the front and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist and a gentle flare to the hem.
V-neck top in satin with lace trims, a sewn-in wrapover at the front and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist and a gentle flare to the hem.
Leather sandals with straps with metal buckles at the top and a strap with a hook and loop fastening around the heel. Fabric linings, suede insoles and textured thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Sleeveless blouse in satin with a lace yoke and a round neckline with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck. Straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides.
Short grosgrain necklace with plastic pendants with faceted beads in glass and plastic. Fastens with ties at the back. Total length approx. 98 cm.
Trousers in soft slub cotton jersey with sections in woven fabric. Elasticated waist, decorative buttons at the front, side pockets, a back pocket and elasticated hems.
Knee-length, fitted dress in lace with a deep V-neck front and back, long sleeves, a seam at the waist and a scalloped trim around the neckline and hem. Partly lined.

Set with a T-shirt in cotton jersey and dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. T-shirt with an open chest pocket and decorative seam at the front. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Dungarees with an open front pocket, straps with adjustable buttons at the front, and legs with appliqués and rolled-up edges at the hems.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a wide flounce at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, one with a small decoration.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a wide flounce at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, one with a small decoration.
Parka woven in a modal blend with a soft, brushed finish. Hood, diagonal zip down the front, a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and long sleeves with a tab and button. Unlined.
Slim, ankle-length trousers in patterned imitation leather with a high waist, zip fly and press-studs.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, hook-and-eye fasteners and zip fly. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, hook-and-eye fasteners and zip fly. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, hook-and-eye fasteners and zip fly. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, hook-and-eye fasteners and zip fly. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Jacket in woven fabric with shawl lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist and jetted front pockets. Lined.
Top in woven fabric with lace details, wide shoulder straps and a deep V-neck front and back.
Top in woven fabric with lace details, wide shoulder straps and a deep V-neck front and back.
Top in woven fabric with lace details, wide shoulder straps and a deep V-neck front and back.
Ankle-high sandals with open toes, open heels, a zip in one side and covered block heels. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Platform 1.5 cm, heel 11 cm.
Ankle-high sandals with open toes, open heels, a zip in one side and covered block heels. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Platform 1.5 cm, heel 11 cm.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and a small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Lace yoke at the front and short butterfly sleeves.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and a small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Lace yoke at the front and short butterfly sleeves.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and a small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Lace yoke at the front and short butterfly sleeves.
Elastic hairband with flower appliqués.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Glittery Alice band with ears on the top.
Short, fitted jersey dress with a deep V-neck and a seam at the waist. Jersey lining.
Body in soft, patterned satin with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck. Seam at the hips and a jersey lower section with press-studs at the crotch.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Hairband in patterned satin with a decorative knot detail at the front and covered elastic at the back.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Plastic Alice band covered in patterned satin with a large bow on one side with a small rabbit-shaped pendant.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative tie detail at the top.
Pull-on trousers in cotton jersey with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Flap leg pockets and elasticated hems.
Fully lined bikini. Top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, two rows of flounces, a small metal decoration at the front and a plastic fastener at the back. Matching bikini bottoms.
Fully lined bikini. Top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, two rows of flounces, a small metal decoration at the front and a plastic fastener at the back. Matching bikini bottoms.
Fully lined bikini. Top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, two rows of flounces, a small metal decoration at the front and a plastic fastener at the back. Matching bikini bottoms.

Striped bikini. Lined triangle top with triangle top with decorative tassels at the front, adjustable ties at the back of the neck and a plastic fastener at the back. Fully lined bottoms with decorative ties at the sides.
Satin-covered Alice band with floral decorations on top.
Double-layered hairband made from braided fake hair with fabric butterfly appliqués at the front and elastic at the back.
Glittery set with two hair elastics and two hair clips with appliqués in the shape of butterflies. Hair elastics without metal clips. Hair clips in metal, length 5 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Patterned satin tie. Width 7 cm.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a wrapover and buttons at the front. Lined.

Elastic hairband decorated with fabric flowers.
Elastic hairband decorated with fabric flowers.
Straight-cut blouse in a sequin-embroidered weave with a large collar and concealed buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and cuffs with concealed press-studs. Lined.
Cropped off-the-shoulder top in glittery jersey with smocking at the top and hem, and long wide sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Cropped off-the-shoulder top in glittery jersey with smocking at the top and hem, and long wide sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.

Bucket bag in imitation leather with round metal handles and a narrow, detachable shoulder strap with carabiner hooks. Concealed magnetic fastening and one inner compartment. Unlined. Size 11x16x21 cm.
Trousers woven in a viscose blend with a high paper bag waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets and tapered legs.
